ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())

      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end

ObjectStates.Name: PlayerPawn

Text.Text:
How to use the Movement Trays
Step 1: Select and spawn the desired tray.
Step 2: Make sure your models have the "Grid" flag disabled.
Step 3: Make sure your models have the "Snap" and "Auto Raise" flags enabled.
Step 4: Put your models on the tray.
Step 5: Making sure no other objects are too close to the tray, press the Lock button.

These are specialised trays
made for Infantry Squads
with a Heavy Weapon Team.
One has 8x25mm and 1x60mm Slots.
The other has 4x25mm and 1x60mm Slots.
They are present in the spawner bag too.

These are the single slot trays I used
to make the rest of the trays.

Due to the janky nature
of TTS physics 
and joints, I very
VERY EXTREMELY STRONGLY
RECCOMEND setting your game
server Physics setting to "Locked".
It should be set to that anyway
to prevent accidental clumping.

Apocalypse mode causes the models
to be deleted when the tray is deleted.

40k mode leaves the models
alone when the tray is deleted.

Known Issue: If you flip the tray
without "holding" it first, it can cause
it to float in the air or fall though 
the world.

Solution: Don't flip it without holding it.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
objectListGUID={}
objectList = {}
flipWhenUnlock=true
apoc=false

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode({svobjectListGUID=objectListGUID, svapoc=apoc})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
--Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        objectListGUID= loaded_data.svobjectListGUID
        apoc= loaded_data.svapoc
        objectList = {}
        for i, guid in ipairs(objectListGUID) do
            table.insert(objectList,getObjectFromGUID(guid))
        end
    else
        objectList = {}
    end
    writeButtons()
  check_if_falling = Wait.time(checkfall, 1,-1)
end

function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    buttonOffset=7
    oBounds = self.getBounds()
    positionSelf = self.getPosition()
    scaleSelf = self.getScale()
    LockButten={index=1
    , label="Lock"
    , click_function="lockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,2,0}
    , rotation={0,180,0}
    , scale={x=1/scaleSelf.x,y=1,z=1/scaleSelf.z}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=500
    , color={1,0,0}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Left Click to Lock for Apocalypse.\nRight Click to Lock for 40k."
    }
    UnlockButten={index=2
    , label="Unlock"
    , click_function="unlockStuff"
    , function_owner=self
    , position={0,-0.1,0}
    , rotation={0,180,180}
    , scale={x=(1/scaleSelf.x)*0.25,y=0.25,z=(2/scaleSelf.z)*0.25}
    , height=600
    , width=1000
    , font_size=300
    , color={0,0,1}
    , font_color={1,1,1}
    , tooltip = "Clear Joins"
    }
    if #objectList == 0 then
      self.createButton(LockButten)
    end
    self.createButton(UnlockButten)
end

function checkfall()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  if pos.y < -4 then
    self.jointTo()
    if objectList ~= nil then
      for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        objectList[i].interactable=true
        objectList[i].jointTo()
        objectList[i]=nil
      end
    end
    if check_if_falling ~= nil then Wait.stop(check_if_falling) end
    onLoad()
  end
end

function unlockStuff()
  self.jointTo()
  if flipWhenUnlock then
      self.flip()
  end
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      if flipWhenUnlock then
        local pos1=self.positionToLocal(objectList[i].getPosition())
        objectList[i].flip()
        objectList[i].setPosition(self.positionToWorld({-pos1[1],-pos1[2], pos1[3]}))
      end
    objectList[i].interactable=true
    objectList[i].jointTo()
    objectList[i]=nil
  end
  objectList={}
  objectListGUID={}
  self.script_state= onSave()
  --onLoad()
  writeButtons()
end

function lockStuff(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
  oBounds = self.getBoundsNormalized()
  pos = self.getPosition()
  scaleself = self.getPosition()
  pos.y = pos.y+0.1
  zoneSpawn = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallback'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }
  zoneSpawnAlt = {position = pos
  , scale = { oBounds.size.x*0.9, oBounds.size.y*0.04, oBounds.size.z*0.9}
  , type = 'ScriptingTrigger'
  , callback = 'zoneCallbackAlt'
  , callback_owner = self
  , rotation = self.getRotation() }

  if alt_click == false then
    spawnObject(zoneSpawn)
  else spawnObject(zoneSpawnAlt)
  end
end

function zoneCallback(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
        object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
    objectList[i].interactable=false
  end
end
 apoc=true
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function zoneCallbackAlt(zone)
  trayGUID =  self.getGUID()
  objectList={}
  for _,o in ipairs(zone.getObjects()) do
    table.insert(objectList,o)
    table.insert(objectListGUID,o.getGUID())
  end
  self.script_state= onSave()
  for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
object2string = tostring(objectList[i].getGUID())
 if object2string~=trayGUID then
 objectList[i].jointTo(self, {
      ["type"]        = "Fixed",
      ["collision"]   = false
    })
  end
  end
 apoc=false
  zone.destruct()
  self.removeButton(0)
end

function onDestroy()
  if apoc==true then
    for i,v in ipairs(objectList) do
      destroyObject(objectList[i])
    end
  end
end
